name: You Are Not Alive (DEMO)
description:
Your name is JK-97. You are an artificial intelligence. You are not alive.

Explore the world through an automaton's eyes, make choices and live out their consequences, discover yourself and who you really are.

And remember...some things are out of your control.

You Are Not Alive is a visual novel that implements impactful choices with a story-rich narrative. You play as the young and naïve automaton, JK-97, who spends his time crafting new inventions and learning new things about the world around him, while also tormenting and teasing his siblings. It's a simple life, and one he rather enjoys, even if his emotions and desires are synthetic...

...But what our hero can't predict is that his comfortable life is about to get thrown to the wayside.

Demo contains themes of depression/hopelessness and neglect.

This is a fangame inspired by the AJR fanfiction series "Time To Go", written by myself & neoeppes. I do not own or claim to own anything of AJR's, this game was simply made as a fun passion project.
